org.apache.poi.sl.usermodel

Interface TextShape<S extends Shape<S,P>,P extends TextParagraph<S,P,? extends TextRun>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAdjustableShape, java.lang.Iterable<P>, PlaceableShape<S,P>, Shape<S,P>, SimpleShape<S,P>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutoShape<S,P>, FreeformShape<S,P>, Line<S,P>, TableCell<S,P>, TextBox<S,P>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HSLFAutoShape, HSLFFreeformShape, HSLFLine, HSLFPlaceholder, HSLFTableCell, HSLFTextBox, HSLFTextShape, Polygon, XSLFAutoShape, XSLFFreeformShape, XSLFTableCell, XSLFTextBox, XSLFTextShape 

    public interface TextShape<S extends Shape<S,P>,P extends TextParagraph<S,P,? extends TextRun>>
extends SimpleShape<S,P>, java.lang.Iterable<P>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TextShape.TextAutofit
      Specifies alist of auto-fit types.(指定自动配合类型的列表。)
      static class  TextShape.TextDirection
      Vertical Text Types(垂直文本类型)
      static class  TextShape.TextPlaceholder
      This enum represents a compromise for the handling of HSLF run types (see org.apache.poi.hslf.record.TextHeaderAtom) and XSLF placeholders (see org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.Placeholder).(此列举代表了HSLF运行类型（请参阅org.apache.poi.hslf.record.TextHeaderAtom）和xsLF占位符（请参阅org.apache.poi.xslf. usermode.Placeholder）处理的妥协。)

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        java.lang.String getText()
        Returns the text contained in this text frame, which has been made safe for printing and other use.(返回此文本框架中包含的文本，该文本框架已安全用于打印和其他用途。)
        Returns:
        the text string for this textbox.(此文本框的文本字符串。)
        Since:
        POI 3.14-Beta2

      • setText

        TextRun setText(java.lang.String text)
        Sets (overwrites) the current text. Uses the properties of the first paragraph / textrun. Text paragraphs are split by \\r or \\n. New lines within text run are split by \\u000b(设置（覆盖）当前文本。使用第一个段落/ textrun的属性。文本段落按\\r或\\n拆分。文本运行中的新行被' u 00 b拆分)
        Parameters:
        text - the text string used by this object.(text -此对象使用的文本字符串。)
        Returns:
        the last text run of the - potential split - text(潜在拆分文本的最后一次文本运行)

      • appendText

        TextRun appendText(java.lang.String text,
                   boolean newParagraph)
        Adds the supplied text onto the end of the TextParagraphs, creating a new RichTextRun for it to sit in.(将提供的文本添加到TextParagraphs的末尾，创建一个新的RichTextRun供其驻留。)
        Parameters:
        text - the text string to be appended.(text -要附加的文本字符串。)
        newParagraph - if true, a new paragraph will be added, which will contain the added text(newParagraph -如果为true，将添加一个新段落，其中将包含添加的文本)
        Since:
        POI 3.14-Beta1

      • getTextParagraphs

        java.util.List<P> getTextParagraphs()
        Returns:
        the TextParagraphs for this text box(此文本框的文本段落)

        Insets2D getInsets()
        Returns:
        text shape margin(文本形状页边距)

        Sets the shape margins(设置形状页边)
        Parameters:

      • getTextHeight

        double getTextHeight()
        Compute the cumulative height occupied by the text(计算文本占用的累积高度)
        Returns:
        the cumulative height occupied by the text(文本占据的累积高度)

      • getTextHeight

        double getTextHeight(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics)
        Compute the cumulative height occupied by the text(计算文本占用的累积高度)
        Parameters:
        graphics - a customized graphics context, e.g. which contains font mappings(图形-自定义的图形上下文，例如包含字体映射)
        Returns:
        the cumulative height occupied by the text(文本占据的累积高度)
        Since:
        POI 3.17-beta2

      • getVerticalAlignment

        VerticalAlignment getVerticalAlignment()
        Returns the type of vertical alignment for the text.(返回文本的垂直对齐类型。)
        Returns:
        the type of vertical alignment(垂直对齐类型)

      • setVerticalAlignment

        void setVerticalAlignment(VerticalAlignment vAlign)
        Sets the type of vertical alignment for the text.(设置文本的垂直对齐类型。)
        Parameters:
        vAlign - - the type of alignment. A null values unsets this property.(vAlign - -对齐类型。空值会取消此属性。)

      • isHorizontalCentered

        boolean isHorizontalCentered()
        Returns if the text is centered. If true and if the individual paragraph settings allow it, the whole text block will be displayed centered, i.e. its left and right margin will be maximized while still keeping the alignment of the paragraphs(如果文本居中，则返回。如果为真并且各个段落设置允许，则整个文本块将以中心显示，即其左右页边距将最大化，同时仍保持段落的对齐方式)
        Returns:
        true, if the text anchor is horizontal centered(如果文本锚点水平居中，则为真)

      • setHorizontalCentered

        void setHorizontalCentered(java.lang.Boolean isCentered)
        Sets if the paragraphs are horizontal centered(设置段落是否水平居中)
        Parameters:
        isCentered - true, if the paragraphs are horizontal centered A null values unsets this property.(isCentred- true，如果段落水平居中空值会取消此属性。)

      • getWordWrap

        boolean getWordWrap()
        Returns:
        whether to wrap words within the bounding rectangle(是否将单词包裹在边界矩形内)

      • setWordWrap

        void setWordWrap(boolean wrap)
        Parameters:
        wrap - whether to wrap words within the bounding rectangle(wrap -是否将单词包裹在边界矩形内)

      • getTextDirection

        TextShape.TextDirection getTextDirection()
        Returns:
        vertical orientation of the text(文本的垂直方向)

      • setTextDirection

        void setTextDirection(TextShape.TextDirection orientation)
        sets the vertical orientation(设置垂直方向)
        Parameters:
        orientation - vertical orientation of the text(方向-文本的垂直方向)

      • getTextRotation

        java.lang.Double getTextRotation()
        The text rotation can be independent specified from the shape rotation. For XSLF this can be an arbitrary degree, for HSLF the degree is given in steps of 90 degrees(文本旋转可以独立于形状旋转指定。对于xsLF，这可以是任意度数，对于HSLF，度数以90度的步进形式给出)
        Returns:
        text rotation in degrees, returns null if no rotation is given(文本旋转度，如果未给出旋转，则返回空)

      • setTextRotation

        void setTextRotation(java.lang.Double rotation)
        Sets the text rotation. For XSLF this can ben an arbitrary degree, for HSLF the rotation is rounded to next 90 degree step(设置文本旋转。对于XLLF，旋转可以弯曲任意角度，对于HSLF，旋转被四舍五入到下一个90度步)
        Parameters:
        rotation - the text rotation, or null to unset the rotation(旋转-文本旋转，或为空以取消设置旋转)

      • setTextPlaceholder

        void setTextPlaceholder(TextShape.TextPlaceholder placeholder)
        Sets the text placeholder(设置文本占位符)

      • getTextPlaceholder

        TextShape.TextPlaceholder getTextPlaceholder()
        Returns:
        the text placeholder(文本占位符)

      • resizeToFitText

        java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D resizeToFitText()
        Adjust the size of the shape so it encompasses the text inside it.(调整形状的大小，使其包含其中的文本。)
        Returns:
        a Rectangle2D that is the bounds of this shape.(矩形2D，即该形状的边界。)
        Since:
        POI 3.17-beta2

      • resizeToFitText

        java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D resizeToFitText(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics)
        Adjust the size of the shape so it encompasses the text inside it.(调整形状的大小，使其包含其中的文本。)
        Parameters:
        graphics - a customized graphics context, e.g. which contains font mappings(图形-自定义的图形上下文，例如包含字体映射)
        Returns:
        a Rectangle2D that is the bounds of this shape.(矩形2D，即该形状的边界。)
        Since:
        POI 3.17-beta2
